Uses of Class
org.apache.distributedlog.exceptions.LockingException

  • Packages that use LockingException 
    Package Description
    org.apache.distributedlog.exceptions
    Defines exceptions used across distributedlog project.
    org.apache.distributedlog.lock
    Distributed locking mechanism in distributedlog

    • Uses of LockingException in org.apache.distributedlog.exceptions

      Subclasses of LockingException in org.apache.distributedlog.exceptions 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LockCancelledException
      A lock is cancelled when waiting for locking a stream.
      class  OwnershipAcquireFailedException
      Exception is thrown when a log writer attempt to acquire a lock.

    • Uses of LockingException in org.apache.distributedlog.lock

      Subclasses of LockingException in org.apache.distributedlog.lock 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EpochChangedException
      Exception indicates that epoch already changed when executing a given LockAction.
      class  LockClosedException
      Exception indicates that the lock was closed (unlocked) before the lock request could complete.
      class  LockSessionExpiredException
      Exception indicates that the lock's zookeeper session was expired before the lock request could complete.
      class  LockStateChangedException
      Exception thrown when lock state changed
      class  LockTimeoutException
      Exception thrown when acquiring lock timeout
      Methods in org.apache.distributedlog.lock that throw LockingException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ZKDistributedLock.checkOwnership()
      Check if lock is held.
      void NopDistributedLock.checkOwnership() 
      void DistributedLock.checkOwnership()
      Check if the lock is held.
      void ZKDistributedLock.checkOwnershipAndReacquire()
      Check if hold lock, if it doesn't, then re-acquire the lock.
      void NopDistributedLock.checkOwnershipAndReacquire() 
      void DistributedLock.checkOwnershipAndReacquire()
      Check if hold lock.
      void SessionLock.tryLock(long timeout, TimeUnit unit)
      Acquire the lock if it is free within given waiting time.
